post.desc: Returns one or more `Reservations` in exchange for one or more `Reservation` purchases.

202.desc: The request is accepted and is being processed.

Azure-AsyncOperation.desc: URL for checking the ongoing status of the operation.

Location.desc: URL for determining when an operation has completed. Only use this value only when Azure-AsyncOperation isn't returned.

Retry-After.desc: Clients should wait for the Retry-After interval before polling again
